_description: This package.json defines the React frontend dependencies, build scripts, and development tools for the Task Tracker client application.
name: client
_name_comment: Package name for the frontend React application
_private_comment: Prevents accidental publication to npm registry
_version_comment: Development version - not yet ready for production release
_type_comment: Use ES modules (import/export) instead of CommonJS (require/module.exports)

scripts._scripts_comment: npm scripts for development, building, testing, and code quality
scripts._dev_comment: Start development server with hot reloading on http://localhost:5173
scripts._build_comment: Create optimized production build in dist/ folder
scripts._lint_comment: Run ESLint to check code quality and style issues
scripts._preview_comment: Preview production build locally before deployment
scripts._test_comment: Run unit tests using Vitest testing framework
scripts._test:watch_comment: Run tests in watch mode - re-runs when files change
scripts._test:ui_comment: Run tests with interactive web UI for better test visualization
scripts._test:coverage_comment: Run tests and generate detailed code coverage report

dependencies._dependencies_comment: Production dependencies required for the React application to run
dependencies._axios_comment: HTTP client library for making API requests to the backend server
dependencies._react_comment: Core React library for building user interfaces with components
dependencies._react-dom_comment: React package for DOM rendering and manipulation
dependencies._react-router-dom_comment: Declarative routing library for React - handles navigation between pages

devDependencies._@testing-library/react_comment: React testing utilities focusing on user behavior rather than implementation

devDependencies._@types/react_comment: TypeScript type definitions for React (enables better IDE support)

devDependencies._eslint_comment: Pluggable JavaScript linter for identifying and fixing code quality issues

devDependencies._jsdom_comment: JavaScript implementation of DOM for testing React components in Node.js
devDependencies._vite_comment: Fast build tool and development server with hot module replacement
